name: SoftBud!
description:
You need to have Steam running in background in order to play the game !! Description :

SoftBud! A game about jumping around with a softbody slime. 

The game has been adapted to be played in multiplayer (not finished) via SteamNetwork so if you wan't to race with your friends or want to PvP with them, you can !

Keybinds : ZQSDMoveAIncrease sizeEDecrease sizeEscPauseLeft clickShoot good point (Multiplayer only)
Right clickShoot bad point (Multiplayer only)

Discord server (French only) : https://discord.gg/XQ6z2ktKaV
